summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated Saturday, August 10, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, and leave statuses for correctional and non-correctional staff, including overtime and comp time occurrences.

persons.name: Noel, T
persons.context: Listed as an officer assigned to various posts including SHU (Special Housing Unit) and appears in shift change and overtime entries.

persons.name: Thomas, M
persons.context: Listed as an officer, appears in entries related to sick/annual leave and shift assignments in the SHU.

events.title: MCC New York Daily Staff Roster

locations: MCC NEW YORK NEW YORK, NY
keyFacts: This document is a staff roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York dated August 10, 2019.
It lists assignments for posts including Special Housing Unit (SHU), control rooms, lobbies, escorts, and dry cells.
The roster tracks staff statuses such as Day Off, Sick Leave, Annual Leave, and overtime/comp time occurrences.
Two named correctional officers, Noel, T and Thomas, M, are listed with assignments and leave statuses.
The document is administrative and does not directly reference Jeffrey Epstein or any specific incidents related to his case.
